text: Roberto Delmastro Naso (17 October 1945 - 26 December 2014) was a Chilean politician and engineer. Delmastro was born in Santiago, Chile. He served in the Chamber of Deputies of Chile representing the 53rd district from March 1998 through March 2014. Delmastro died from lung cancer at his home in Valdivia, Chile, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Chilean politicians Category:Chilean engineers Category:Politicians from Santiago Category:Scientists from Santiago
title: Roberto Delmastro
